marq.Qatar Visa Center, Colombo will resume o: Qatar Visa Center, Colombo will resume operations from 20th of January 2021 and the appointment bookings are available now | Please be informed that Qatar Visa Centers (QVCs) do not provide job offers of any kind. QVC role is to provide the legal services necessary for the issuance of visa. Hence, kindly beware of fraudulent/fictitious job offers from individuals misrepresenting themselves as agents or representatives of Qatar Visa Center

bannerPart.bannerText: Best of Medical Technology & Healthcare Services

contentTitle.Medical Requirements For Expat Workers W: Medical Requirements For Expat Workers Who Wish To Live & Work In The State Of Qatar
contentTitle.Please send us your resume at: Please send us your resume at

contentText.Expats who wish to be employed and resid: Expats who wish to be employed and reside in the State of Qatar are required to apply for a Residence Visa with the Qatar government. As a part of the requirements, applicants from specific countries are further required to undergo a medical fitness check while being in their home country.
contentText.The Qatar Medical Centers (QMC) follow s: The Qatar Medical Centers (QMC) follow strict guidelines provided by the Qatar Ministry of Interior to provide an efficient and up-to-date medical fitness check aligned to the government’s requirements. Our centers are conveniently located in the following countries and cities:
contentText.Our team is well-versed with government: Our team is well-versed with government visa requirements and able to support applicants throughout the medical test part of the application process.Once the appointment is confirmed, the visa medical process is carried out in sequential steps and the applicants are led through the center efficiently and seamlessly.
contentText.Applicants are expected to have prelimin: Applicants are expected to have preliminary medical checks in their home country as part of the visa application process for The State of Qatar
contentText.Medical check-up is mandatory before tra: Medical check-up is mandatory before travelling to Qatar
contentText.Stemz Healthcare was founded in 2015, to: Stemz Healthcare was founded in 2015, to become the leading healthcare service provider for tourists, immigrants, and working professionals. We are a globally established organization and believe in creating lasting relationships with our employees, partners, and visitors, that establishes a positive environment based on honesty and trust.
contentText.Stemz Healthcare is backed by a team of: Stemz Healthcare is backed by a team of highly qualified healthcare professionals with internal systems and processes based on the latest medical standards and best practices.
contentText.Take the next step in your career with Q: Take the next step in your career with Qatar Medical Center
contentText.Please remember to mention the job title: Please remember to mention the job title and location in the subject line.

contentText.Stemz Healthcare was founded in 2015, to: Stemz Healthcare was founded in 2015, to become the leading healthcare service provider for tourists, immigrants, and working professionals. We are a globally established organization and believe in creating lasting relationships with our employees, partners, and visitors, that establishes a positive environment based on honesty and trust.
contentText.Our infrastructure, systems, and process: Our infrastructure, systems, and processes have been developed to provide support and comfort to applicants and visitors while ensuring all government requirements are adhered to. At Stemz Healthcare we believe in innovation and continuous growth. We provide support to our employees, ensure they are trained on the latest techniques, processes, and protocols, and maintain an up-to-date technology-enabled environment at all our centers.
contentText.Stemz Healthcare manages the Visa Medica: Stemz Healthcare manages the Visa Medical part of the process through the Qatar Medical Centers which are strategically located in the same location as the Qatar Visa Centers for the convenience of the applicants.
contentText.The Ministry of Interior, State of Qatar: The Ministry of Interior, State of Qatar has awarded a mandate to Biomet Services Pte. Ltd to provide select residency procedures on its behalf in eight countries through the Qatar Visa Centers.
contentText.As per the agreement, those coming to wo: As per the agreement, those coming to work in Qatar must complete their biometric enrollment, undergo medical examinations, and sign their work contracts in their home countries before coming to Qatar.
contentText.The first phase of the project will take: The first phase of the project will take place in eight countries: India, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Philippines & Tunisia with the first ‘Qatar Visa Center launched in Colombo, Sri Lanka.
contentText.The main objective behind this project i: The main objective behind this project is for the Ministry of Interior to align the rights of the workers with the best international standards while providing the services in the state-of-the-art facilities through a seamless efficient process.
contentText.Our expertise and effective collaboratio: Our expertise and effective collaboration make sure that we achieve our goal of becoming the leading integrated global healthcare provider for travel and general health.
contentText.As the dedicated provider for medical he: As the dedicated provider for medical health screenings, our goal is to provide an efficient customer-oriented service. We are one strong team united by our mission and values in our relentless quest to be the global partner of choice in Travel healthcare solutions. We are committed to building symbiotic relationships.
contentText.Visa Medical Services – Some governments: Visa Medical Services – Some governments require a certificate of health before applying for entry visas, these tests may differ depending upon various factors including nationality and the type of visa applied for.
contentText.Stemz Healthcare provides visa medical s: Stemz Healthcare provides visa medical services to individuals who must meet medical fitness standards when applying for work or tourist visas for specific countries. Our protocols are aligned to the requirements of international government departments

contentText.Our team is well-versed with government: Our team is well-versed with government visa requirements and able to support applicants throughout the medical test part of the application process. Once the appointment is confirmed, the visa medical process is carried out in sequential steps and the applicants are led through the center efficiently and seamlessly.
contentText.Applicants are expected to have a prelim: Applicants are expected to have a preliminary medical check as part of the visa application process for Qatar. In some cases, applicants may be required to undergo further tests or investigations before their medical fitness certificate can be issued.
contentText.These tests are scheduled with partner r: These tests are scheduled with partner referral hospitals and specialized labs within the city and the applicants are required to return to the medical center to submit their reports personally.

contentTitle.Please send us your resume at careers@qa: Please send us your resume at careers@qatarmedicalcenter.com

contentText.Take the next step in your career with Q: Take the next step in your career with Qatar Medical Center

contentTitle.How are Visa Medical Tests Scheduled?: How are Visa Medical Tests Scheduled?

contentTitle.How do I book a Visa Medical examination: How do I book a Visa Medical examination?

contentTitle.What important information do I need to: What important information do I need to know before I arrive for my appointment?
contentTitle.What do I need to bring on the day of ap: What do I need to bring on the day of appointment?
contentTitle.How long will the Visa Medical Testing a: How long will the Visa Medical Testing at the Center take?
contentTitle.What happens if I forget the required it: What happens if I forget the required items on the day of appointment?

contentTitle.Can I complete a chest x-ray examination: Can I complete a chest x-ray examination if I am pregnant?

contentTitle.Whom do I contact to find-out if my visa: Whom do I contact to find-out if my visa has been granted?

contentText.All Visa Medical Tests are carried out a: All Visa Medical Tests are carried out at the Qatar Medical centers within a few hours after applicants complete their visa application process and biometric enrolment at the Qatar Visa Center (QVC).
contentText.The Visa Medical Test is automatically s: The Visa Medical Test is automatically scheduled when the applicants book their appointment for biometric enrolment via the QVC website. The time interval between both appointments is approximately one hour.
contentText.Example: If the biometric appointment is: Example: If the biometric appointment is set for 09:30 AM as per the QVC website appointment scheduler, the Visa Medical Test is automatically set at 10:30 AM
contentText.For any information on the appointment a: For any information on the appointment at Qatar visa Center, Please click
contentText.Appointments for first time booking can: Appointments for first time booking can be done at the Qatar visa center. Please click
contentText.Appointments for referral booking or any: Appointments for referral booking or any pending medical tests can be done at Qatar Medical center
contentText.All appointments are managed by the Qata: All appointments are managed by the Qatar Visa Center, Please refer to the details here
contentText.The Visa Medical Report is usually valid: The Visa Medical Report is usually valid for a period of Sixty (60) days from the date of issue depending upon your visa category. Please get in touch with your sponsor for further information.
contentText.All appointments booked through the Qata: All appointments booked through the Qatar Visa Center appointment scheduling system are automatically eligible for a Visa Medical Test on the same day. An applicant is not required to schedule an appointment separately for Visa Medical Test, except in the case of a missed appointment, whereby the applicant will need to re-schedule the appointment via the Qatar Visa Center website
contentText.If you have completed a Visa Medical Tes: If you have completed a Visa Medical Test within the last 3 months and you are required to do the same test for a different category of visa, please contact your sponsor for further instruction
contentText.It is recommended to arrive at the cente: It is recommended to arrive at the center at least 15 minutes before the appointment
contentText.If you are late for your appointment by: If you are late for your appointment by more than 15 minutes, then your appointment may be re-scheduled to later time.
contentText.The Visa Medical Test takes approximatel: The Visa Medical Test takes approximately 2 hours to be completed
contentText.No fasting is required –Eat and drink as: No fasting is required –Eat and drink as normal prior to your appointment.
contentText.Do not wear any metallic objects such as: Do not wear any metallic objects such as jewelry when you come for the medical test.
contentText.Do not bring any luggage or bags as thes: Do not bring any luggage or bags as these are not allowed in the centre.
contentText.Food items are not allowed inside the ce: Food items are not allowed inside the center
contentText.Applicants with confirmed appointment ar: Applicants with confirmed appointment are allowed in the centre, However, if applicant is disabled or a minor then he/she can be accompanied by another person to assist. Please notify the location security staff if you require further assistance.
contentText.Do not carry laptops or any other electr: Do not carry laptops or any other electronic devices, apart from your mobile phone.
contentText.You may be required to store your person: ou may be required to store your personal belongings in the dedicated lockers before entering the medical center.
contentText.Taking pictures/photographs without the: Taking pictures/photographs without the permission of authorized personnel in the centre is strictly prohibited.
contentText.You will be required to sign a consent f: You will be required to sign a consent form before starting the visa medical process.
contentText.The Qatar Medical Center shall not be re: The Qatar Medical Center shall not be responsible for any loss of personal items or belongings.
contentText.All documents released by Qatar Visa Cen: All documents released by Qatar Visa Center
contentText.Any medial report(s) relating to your he: Any medial report(s) relating to your health condition
contentText.Prescription glasses or contact lenses (: PPrescription glasses or contact lenses (if applicable)
contentText.It is recommended to arrive 15 minutes b: It is recommended to arrive 15 minutes before the appointment. The Visa Medical Test may take upto 02 hours to be completed.
contentText.If you do not bring a certain document r: If you do not bring a certain document required for the Visa medical process, you may be required to re-schedule your appointment to the next available time/date.
contentText.The video describes steps of the Visa Me: The video describes steps of the Visa Medical Process  https://qatarmedicalcenter.com/sl/visa-medical-services/
contentText.All Applicants will be notified through: All Applicants will be notified through an SMS or call in the event they are required to undergo any additional test as a part of the referral process
contentText.During the Visa Medical process, if ther: During the Visa Medical process, if there is any finding that requires further investigation, the applicant will have to revisit the Qatar Medical Center to get further instructions in order to complete their Visa Medical process. Appointment can be booked either by contacting the call center or by visiting
contentText.If the applicant doesn’t visit the cente: If the applicant doesn’t visit the center within four (04) weeks from the date of his/her first visit, then applicant may have to go through the entire visa medical process again and the current medical process will be deemed expired.
contentText.All medical Referrals will require appli: All medical Referrals will require applicant to collect a referral letter from the center, visit the specialist referred to complete the required medical tests and return to the center with the referral report/ invoices.
contentText.The Qatar Medical Center will submit you: The Qatar Medical Center will submit your medical test results directly to the respective authority. Please get in touch with your sponsor if you require any further information regarding your medical test. For any further assistance please get in touch with the QVC contact center.
contentText.We are supportive of reasonable preferen: We are supportive of reasonable preferences. In case of female doctor assistance, we will do our best to accommodate you.
contentText.All applicants are required to remove je: All applicants are required to remove jewelry and/or any metallic accessories. Long hair must be tied back and away from the face and front body area.
contentText.If you normally wear a head covering (hi: If you normally wear a head covering (hijab), you can still wear this at the time of visible for a photograph from the bottom of your chin to above your eyebrows,including both cheeks for identity check.medical examination. However, at some point of time, your face must be clearly.
contentText.In case of a pregnancy, it is imperative: In case of a pregnancy, it is imperative that you MUST notify us during the registration process.
contentText.Chest X-Ray will not be processed incase: Chest X-Ray will not be processed incase of a suspected pregnant applicant.
contentText.No. However, your photograph will be tak: No. However, your photograph will be taken on the same day to confirm your identity. Your face must be uncovered for the photograph.
contentText.No. It is necessary to arrive for your a: No. It is necessary to arrive for your appointment not earlier than 15 minutes prior to the scheduled time.
contentText.All appointments are pre-scheduled, and: All appointments are pre-scheduled, and you will be checked-in for your scheduled appointment block even if you arrive early.
contentText.You will receive an update via SMS on th: You will receive an update via SMS on the registered number. The Qatar Medical Centre Center is unable to provide an update about the processing of your visa application. If you need further advice, please contact Qatar Visa Center or your sponsor.
contentText.If a medical referral is required, then: If a medical referral is required, then applicant will be required to re-visit the center. It is important to provide the correct contact information. If the retesting/referral process takes longer than two months, then the entire Visa Medical Test may be repeated.
contentText.If you are at the medical centre, you ca: If you are at the medical centre, you can request for a feedback form. We at Qatar Medical Center welcome your feedback/suggestions (if any) to serve you better. Please write to us on info@qatarmedicalcenter.com

contentText.This privacy policy (‘Policy’) is design: This privacy policy (‘Policy’) is designed to protect the privacy of our user(s). This policy applies to the personal information collected through Stemz Healthcare website (‘Site’) only. According to this policy, personal information is referred to full or partial user details such as full name, email address, phone number, mailing address, photograph, fax numbers, passport number, visa number, passport information, employment details, nationality, etc.
contentText.It’s advisable to read this policy caref: It’s advisable to read this policy carefully before using the site or providing your personal information on the site. Stemz Healthcare reserves the right to collect your personal information at the time of making an appointment, filling contact us form on the site.  We are not responsible to ascertain authenticity or accuracy of the personal information, provided by you. It’s your duty to ensure that your personal information must be accurate, complete and up to date.
contentText.What do we use your information for?: What do we use your information for?
contentText.We use your personal information in proc: We use your personal information in processing the visa application, which is the sole purpose of collecting the information. We do not use your personal information for sending any promotional emails or messages. Though, we welcome all feedback/suggestions pertaining to our site and services that we offer, and use this information to enhance the overall user experience and/or offer the better version of our services in effective and efficient manner.
contentText.How do we protect your information?: How do we protect your information?
contentText.We ensure to take all reasonable measure: We ensure to take all reasonable measures to protect your personal information and provide a safeguard to it against misuse and unauthorised access of the personal information and/or site by any third party, or unauthorised personnel.
contentText.We use secure server. Our network is pro: We use secure server. Our network is protected through firewall security system to prevent any unauthorized access to and/or use of the site, provide secure internet browsing and safeguard to all incoming and outgoing emails. We have certain technical and physical security restrictions that limit access to, and use of, any personal information that we receive through the site.
contentText.Yes, we do. These cookies help us to rem: Yes, we do. These cookies help us to remember and process your personal information accurately, understand and save your preferences for future reference, and gather aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction. Stemz Healthcare may indenture to third-party service provider for better understanding of site traffic and interactions. Though, third party service provider is not permitted to use or access your personal information.
contentText.Do we disclose any information to outsid: Do we disclose any information to outside parties?
contentText.We are against to sell, trade, or otherw: We are against to sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third party.  Authorized personnel of Stemz Healthcare, who are operating the site, conducting business process, and/or servicing you have right to access your personal information and keep it confidential as per the provision. Further, we disclose your personal information to government bodies of Qatar as a part of processing the visa application and other related procedures.  We only release your personal information if it’s appropriate to comply with the law and this policy.
contentText.The site may contain third party links a: The site may contain third party links and redirect you to another websites (‘Linked Site’).  Stemz Healthcare is not responsible and/or has no control on these links and/or the content available on the linked site. we take no responsibility of protecting of your personal information on linked site, provided by you. Only user is sole responsible of all personal information in such cases.
contentText.Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act: Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act Compliance
contentText.We are in compliance with the requiremen: We are in compliance with the requirements of COPPA (Childrens Online Privacy Protection Act), we do not collect any information from anyone under 13 years of age. Our website, products and services are all directed to people who are at least 13 years old or older.
contentText.This online privacy policy applies only: This online privacy policy applies only to information collected through our website and not to information collected offline.
contentText.Refer to our Terms and Conditions sectio: Refer to our Terms and Conditions section of the site.
contentText.You consent to this policy by accessing: You consent to this policy by accessing to, or using this site, or providing personal information through contact us page, making an appointment. You may withdraw your consent at any time by stop accessing to and/or using the site.
contentText.Stemz Healthcare makes periodical change: Stemz Healthcare makes periodical changes in this policy and update on the site, without any prior notification. If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page.

footerAbt.Stemz Healthcare is backed by a team of: Stemz Healthcare is backed by a team of highly qualified healthcare professionals with internal systems and processes based on the latest medical standards and best practices.
